alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Clinton; Gratiot; Ionia; Kent; Montcalm (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 30 at 10:33PM EST until December 31 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog. The area of visibilities below a half mile is expected to expand northward to near I-96 during the early morning hours of Friday. The fog should lift during the mid to late morning Friday. * WHERE...Montcalm, Gratiot, Kent, Ionia, Clinton and Allegan counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...With air temperatures at or below freezing north of I-96 overnight, roads and sidewalks may be icy. The low visibilities in combination with possible icy patches makes this especially dangerous. Be very careful if you have to go outside during this time.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Allegan; Clinton; Gratiot; Ionia; Kent; Montcalm
